Address Update
Thank you for keeping us informed! Please accept this message as confirmation that we have received your request.
If you have provided all of the required information, your address will be updated within two business days.
As a reminder, the following information is required in order to update your address: - Street Number - Street Name - Apartment / Unit Number - City - Province - Postal Code Honda Canada is committed to protecting your personal information, which will only be used in accordance with our Privacy Policy (available at http://honda.ca/privacy).
We will reach out by email if we have any further questions.
Have a terrific day!
The Customer Relations Team
